author: newsr.in
title: Indian football team encounters their fourth straight defeat losing 1-2 to Turkmenistan in 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers - newsR
text: 9 Oct 2015Indian football team slumped to their fourth straight defeat losing 1-2 to Turkmenistan in the 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers Thursday.India thus remained at the bottom of the Group D points table and now have virtually no chance to even qualify for the Asian Cup by finishing third. Â»
